body: So , previously i decided to go to my profile and i wanted to check my stats , but the stats never ever load! So can someone help me . ( Maybe im not registered and now i might look stupid :3 )
body_tagged: So , previously i decided to go to my profile and i wanted to check my stats , but the stats never ever load! So can someone help me . ( Maybe im not registered and now i might look stupid :3 )
title: [AVICUS STATS] Wont Load For Me!

replies.body:
It's a glitch with new players, where their stats won't load.
But try using this link...

http://avicus.net/ItsHurshyMC/stats
replies.body_tagged:

http://avicus.net/ItsHurshyMC/stats

replies.body:
Nahh, website is just crap.

It doesn't register stats of people who joined passed a certain date I believe.
http://avicus.net/ItsHurshyMC/stats
yw

replies.body:
Don't worry, you're not stupid - a lot of players are getting this recently. What MLGtino and MidnightBeats said is true.

It looks like your question is answered, so I don't think there's any reason to use this thread anymore.
